entry.title: RT WBW3 💖🚀: Re @developer_dao 🤝 @womenbuildweb3
entry.summary: RT WBW3 💖🚀 Re @developer_dao 🤝 @womenbuildweb3 Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): 📣 To all women and non-binary members: There’s now a DEVDAO-WOMEN section on Discord for women and non-binary frens to connect and discuss opportunities within the DAO & Web3 space. 🚀 Talks for Twitter Spaces and onboarding events have already started. Drop by & say hi! 🤩

entry.title: for a team, project, company, protocol, or app to be considered web3, it must be decentralized. because it is profitable & en vogue, people are slappi...
entry.summary: for a team, project, company, protocol, or app to be considered web3, it must be decentralized. because it is profitable & en vogue, people are slapping web3 on centralized solutions. we must fight against this & call them out or we will repeat the same mistakes of the past.
